statements: SELECT * FROM TeamMembers WHERE member_id = 1;
SELECT member_name, location FROM TeamMembers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT member_name, meeting_notes FROM TeamMembers WHERE member_id > 3;
SELECT * FROM TeamMembers WHERE member_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT member_id, action_items FROM TeamMembers WHERE action_items->>'status' = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM TeamMembers WHERE member_name = 'Alice';
SELECT member_name, location FROM TeamMembers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT member_name, location, meeting_notes FROM TeamMembers WHERE location = 'London' ORDER BY member_name ASC;
SELECT member_name, location, action_items FROM TeamMembers WHERE action_items->>'status' = 'pending' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM TeamMembers WHERE location = 'Paris' AND action_items @> '{"task": "Code Review"}' ORDER BY member_id DESC;
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_date, meeting_notes FROM meetings
SELECT meeting_date, meeting_notes, meeting_id FROM meetings
SELECT meeting_notes, meeting_id, meeting_date FROM meetings
SELECT * FROM meetings
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_date FROM meetings
SELECT * FROM meetings WHERE meeting_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_date FROM meetings WHERE meeting_id = 5 ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM action_items JOIN meetings ON action_items.meeting_id = meetings.meeting_id ORDER BY meetings.meeting_date ASC, action_items.action_description DESC;

SELECT meetings.meeting_id, meetings.meeting_date, action_items.action_description FROM meetings JOIN action_items ON meetings.meeting_id = action_items.meeting_id WHERE meetings.meeting_date >= '2022-03-01' ORDER BY meetings.meeting_date ASC, action_items.action_description ASC;

SELECT meetings.meeting_id, meetings.meeting_date, action_items.action_description FROM meetings LEFT JOIN action_items ON meetings.meeting_id = action_items.meeting_id WHERE action_items.action_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY meetings.meeting_id ASC, action_items.action_description DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_members
SELECT team_member_name, email FROM team_members WHERE location = 'Office'
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_date, team_member_name FROM meeting_notes JOIN team_members ON meeting_notes.team_member_id = team_members.team_member_id
SELECT item_id, item_description, status FROM action_items WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY item_id DESC

SELECT meeting_id, COUNT(action_items.item_id) AS total_action_items FROM meeting_notes LEFT JOIN action_items ON meeting_notes.meeting_id = action_items.meeting_id GROUP BY meeting_id HAVING total_action_items > 0
SELECT * FROM meeting_notes WHERE meeting_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT team_member_name, location, email FROM team_members WHERE location = 'New York' AND team_member_name LIKE 'John%';

SELECT meeting_notes.meeting_id, meeting_date, team_member_name, item_description FROM meeting_notes JOIN team_members ON meeting_notes.team_member_id = team_members.team_member_id JOIN action_items ON meeting_notes.meeting_id = action_items.meeting_id WHERE action_items.status = 'Incomplete';

SELECT team_member_name, COUNT(meeting_id) AS num_meetings FROM meeting_notes JOIN team_members ON meeting_notes.team_member_id = team_members.team_member_id GROUP BY team_member_name HAVING num_meetings > 3 ORDER BY num_meetings DESC;

SELECT team_member_name, SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'Completed' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS completed_items, SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'Incomplete' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS incomplete_items FROM team_members LEFT JOIN action_items ON team_members.team_member_id = action_items.assigned_to GROUP BY team_member_name;
SELECT * FROM TeamMembers;
SELECT name, location FROM TeamMembers WHERE member_id = 1;
SELECT note_text, created_at FROM MeetingNotes WHERE meeting_id = 3;
SELECT meeting_title, meeting_date FROM Meetings ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ActionItems WHERE completed = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM TeamMembers WHERE location='New York';
SELECT member_id, name FROM TeamMembers WHERE member_id=1;
SELECT meeting_title, meeting_date FROM Meetings ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT note_text FROM MeetingNotes WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-31';
SELECT item_description, completed FROM ActionItems WHERE assigned_to=2 ORDER BY item_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Team_Members
SELECT member_name, location FROM Team_Members ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT * FROM Meetings WHERE location='Conference Room A'
SELECT meeting_notes_id, COUNT(*) FROM Meetings GROUP BY meeting_notes_id
SELECT * FROM Action_Items WHERE status='Pending'
SELECT * FROM Meeting_Notes WHERE created_by='Alice'
SELECT item_description, assigned_to FROM Action_Items WHERE status='Pending' ORDER BY due_date DESC
SELECT member_name, role FROM Team_Members WHERE location='New York' LIMIT 10
SELECT meeting_date, location FROM Meetings WHERE meeting_date>'2022-01-01' AND location LIKE '%Office%'
SELECT meeting_id, item_description, status FROM Meetings JOIN Collaboration ON Meetings.meeting_id = Collaboration.meeting_id JOIN Action_Items ON Collaboration.item_id = Action_Items.item_id
